bioconda.name: bioconductor-interactivedisplaybase
bioconda.summary: Base package for enabling powerful shiny web displays of Bioconductor objects

biotools.summary: This package contains the basic methods needed to generate interactive Shiny-based display methods for BioConductor objects.

bioschemas.name: interactiveDisplayBase
bioschemas.summary: This package contains the basic methods needed to generate interactive Shiny-based display methods for BioConductor objects.
